Articles.Content:
is that possible? or Kos terminal will meltdown with size or script (I think It will weight more then an orange tank if we try to store mechjeb with Kos disks..)?

obviously this kind of autopilot will have to have a cui, not gui and run from archive volume.

Edited March 5, 2016 by omelaw
Kos can't activate mechjeb functions or fill in fields?

It's not exactly on topic, but in the krpc dev thread you can find my work on getting control of mechjeb via krpc.  If krpc isn't going to work with everything else you're doing, it could be used for reference to start building a mechjeb interface for kos.
